title: Account Members
description: An association between a Cloudflare user and an account

links.title: List Members
links.description: List all members of an account

per_page.description: Maximum number of results per page

links.title: Add Member
links.description: Add a user to the list of members for this account

status.description: A member's status in the account

roles.description: Array of roles associated with this member

links.title: Member Details
links.description: Get information about a specific member of an account

links.title: Update Member
links.curl:
curl -X PUT "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/01a7362d577a6c3019a474fd6f485823/members/4536bcfad5faccb111b47003c79917fa" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"id":"4536bcfad5faccb111b47003c79917fa","code":"05dd05cce12bbed97c0d87cd78e89bc2fd41a6cee72f27f6fc84af2e45c0fac0","user":{"id":"7c5dae5552338874e5053f2534d2767a","first_name":"John","last_name":"Appleseed","email":"user@example.com","two_factor_authentication_enabled":false},"status":"accepted","roles":[{"id":"3536bcfad5faccb999b47003c79917fb","name":"Account Administrator","description":"Administrative access to the entire Account","permissions":{"analytics":{"read":true,"write":true},"billing":{"read":true,"write":true},"cache_purge":{"read":true,"write":true},"dns":{"read":true,"write":true},"dns_records":{"read":true,"write":true},"lb":{"read":true,"write":true},"logs":{"read":true,"write":true},"organization":{"read":true,"write":true},"ssl":{"read":true,"write":true},"waf":{"read":true,"write":true},"zones":{"read":true,"write":true},"zone_settings":{"read":true,"write":true}}}]}'

code.description: The unique activation code for the account membership

two_factor_authentication_enabled.description: Whether two-factor authentication is enabled for the user account. This does not apply to API authentication

status.description: A member's status in the account

items.title: Account Roles
items.description: A Role defines what permissions a Member of an Account has.

description.example: Administrative access to the entire Account
